template.name: Notification informs the delegator about the new delegation.
template.subject: CzechIdM - některé Vaše úkoly budou delegovány na uživatele $delegate.Username.
template.bodyHtml:
#macro( printType $state $loc ) #if($loc == "cs") #if( $state == "default-delegation-type" ) Výchozí delegace pro všechny úkoly #elseif( $state == "approve-role-by-manager-delegation-type" ) Delegace pro úkoly schvalující přiřazení rolí dle vedoucího #elseif( $state == "approving-role-request-delegation-type" ) Delegace pro úkoly schvalující změnu oprávnění (celá žádost) #else #end #else #if( $state == "default-delegation-type" ) Default delegation for all tasks #elseif( $state == "approve-role-by-manager-delegation-type" ) Delegation for tasks approving role assignments by a manager #elseif( $state == "approving-role-request-delegation-type" ) Delegation for tasks approves change of authorization (whole request) #else #end #end #end Dobrý den,
byla vytvořena nová delegace, která deleguje některé Vaše úkoly na uživatel $delegate.Username.

Detail této delegace najdete zde zde.

Platnost této delegace je od $from do $till.
#set( $loc = "cs" ) Type delegace: #printType( $delegation.type $loc )
Delegaci vytvořil uživatel: $delegation.OriginalCreator
Poznámka u delegace: $!delegation.Description

CzechIdM © 2020 BCV Solutions s.r.o. 
----------------------------------------- English version -----------------------------------------
Hello,
a new delegation has been created that delegates some of your tasks to the user $delegate.Username.

Detail of this delegation can be found here.

This delegation is valid from $from to $till.
#set( $loc = "en" ) Delegation type: #printType( $delegation.type $loc )
Delegation was created by user: $delegation.OriginalCreator
Delegation description: $!delegation.Description
